resources.string:
• Show Toast on FirstBackPress 
• Use the ToastDisplay 
• Exit on DoubleBackPress

• Show SnackBar on FirstBackPress 
• Use the SnackbarDisplay 
• Execute the default back press action
\n => DoubleBackPressAction : Toast message \n => Set duration for 3000ms

=> FirstBackPressAction : ToastDisplay 
 => DoubleBackPressAction : Exit from the Activity 
 => Set duration for 3000ms

=> FirstBackPressAction : SnackbarDisplay 
 => DoubleBackPressAction : Default back press behaviour reset 
 => Set duration for 3000ms
